```py
>>> import janitor as jn
>>> Xbad = pd.DataFrame(
...     {
...         "A": [1, None, 3],
...         "  sales numbers ": [20.0, 30.0, None],
...     }
... )
>>> jn.clean_names(Xbad)
 a  _sales_numbers_
0  1.0             20.0
1  NaN             30.0
2  3.0              NaN
```

```py
>>> def clean_col(name):
...     return (
...         name.strip().lower().replace(" ", "_")
...     )

>>> Xbad.rename(columns=clean_col)
 a  sales_numbers
0  1.0           20.0
1  NaN           30.0
2  3.0            NaN
```

```py
>>> jn.coalesce(
...     Xbad,
...     columns=["A", "  sales numbers "],
...     new_column_name="val",
... )
 val
0   1.0
1  30.0
2   3.0
```

```py
>>> jn.fill_empty(
...     Xbad,
...     columns=["A", "  sales numbers "],
...     value=10,
... )
 A    sales numbers
0   1.0              20.0
1  10.0              30.0
2   3.0              10.0
```
